turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you do me a favor and order pizzas for the party?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem! What should I ask for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, we'll probably need three pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what kid of crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Gluten-free for all three, I think.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not to be nitpicky, but Mod calls it "gluten friendly".

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, whichever. But the no gluten one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and what toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first, get plain cheese, but ask for the vegan option.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and the second pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Vegan cheese again, but with green peppers and onions this time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yummy! What else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Vegan cheese again, this time with spinach and mushroom.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. So I have 3 gluten friendly pies with vegan cheese, one with spinach and mushroom, one with onion and green pepper, and one plain. Is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You got it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any sides?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Garlic breadsticks would be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I placed the order. You can pick it up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect! thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're quite welcome. They'll text your receipt.
